message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $20000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I'm getting closer to making a decision, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm glad you're getting closer to a decision, but I still need to make a good profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $17500. That's the lowest I can go.
